descriptionlist.description: Install emojiport and iOS 12.1 emojis in one package! Must have the emojiport repo installed, if you don't already, scroll down and add it. I Used elements of the source of minimal hosts blocker to make this project. Open sourced on github. NOTES- downgrade emojiport to 1.2.2f if you have issues, and this DOES NOT work on iOS 10.x on KPPLess jailbreaks.

changelog.change: Actual iOS 10 support! Sorry, this was overdue!
